QuestData.Title: The Citadel's Reach
QuestData.Description: Each day, Hellfire Citadel opens its gates, and more fel orcs pour out and into the camps they've established along the ramparts south of the fortress.$B$BI dispatched one of my most capable trackers, Scout Makha, to track their movements, preparations and numbers, but she hasn't returned to report her findings.$B$BMakha was to focus her efforts on the northernmost camp along the Northern Rampart, near where it ends in the rocks. Find her, $n. Without her information, we're sitting ducks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the northernmost camp along the Northern Rampart for any trace of Scout Makha.
